entries.title: Australian Off-Duty Police Officer Who Drowned on New Year’s Day Was Saving Son
entries.description: Surf Rescue Lifeguards (L) watch swimmers at Bondi Beach near Sydney on November 22, 2009 as people crowd the beach to beat the heat.  As temperatures in Sydney reached 40 degrees Celcius (104 Fahrenheit), prompting thousands to flock to Bondi and surrounding beaches, about 1,000 firefighters were battling about 100 blazes across New South Wales state. Hundreds of homes in eastern Australia were under threat from massive wildfires as soaring temperatures and windy conditions fanned the out-of-control flames, officials said.    AFP PHOTO / Greg WOOD (Photo credit should read GREG WOOD/AFP via Getty Images)
